abstract.description: Explaining the evolution of differences in electricity futures between France and Germany.
event: Qube Research and Technology Data Challenge 2023

detail.context: Market analysts need to understand variations in electricity futures for trading decisions.
detail.approach: Analyzed historical data, visualized trends, and built simple predictive models.
detail.solution_description: Produced a report explaining key factors influencing electricity futures differences.
detail.cons_and_improvements_ideas: Could enhance models for more accurate predictions.
